mapper.select: SELECT t.`ASSET_ID`, t.`INCOME_ITEM_CD`, SUM(IFNULL(t.`MONEY`, 0)) AS MONEY FROM ${TBLNAME} t WHERE t.`ASSET_ID` = #{ASSET_ID} GROUP BY t.`ASSET_ID`, t.`INCOME_ITEM_CD`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `BO_CONTRACT_OUT_ASSET` ( CONTRACT_CD, ASSET_ID, create_date, update_date, create_userid, update_userid ) SELECT DISTINCT t.`CONTRACT_CD`, t.`ASSET_ID`, SYSDATE() AS create_date, SYSDATE() AS update_date, #{USER_ID} AS create_userid, #{USER_ID} AS update_userid FROM ${TBLNAME} t
